patthana11.16:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana11.16:2.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cha.
patthana11.16:3.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana11.16:5.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.16:6.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṃsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana11.16:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.16:8.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṃsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana11.16:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
